Text: Yay! Finally! I've searched long and hard for this game...It's quite fun, Thanks!

Windows 95 game. When you install it says that Windows NT has been detected and won't let you continue.
anyone know where i can find imperialism 2

This is a '95 game. You can play it in Windows XP by altering the settings.
Windows XP automatically runs programs in NT mode. You have to change this; go to the .exe file -> properies -> compability -> Run as Windows 95.
